description.narrative: The United Nations (UN) and United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) through the Bougainville Post Referendum Process Support Project will support the ABG in the ongoing peace building process.

activity-description.narrative: The Post-Referendum Process Support Project (The Project) is designed to support the ongoing Bougainville peacebuilding process.

sector.narrative: Build resilience to shocks and crisis

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

Two vehicles procured and handed over to NCOBA on April 2021, assisting to effectively perform NCOBAs coordination role. IT and conference equipment in value of USD 40,000 were procured for ABG DoIMI.
